: : Rodimus Prime : :

Rodimus turns, facing the CR chamber, as it begins to shake violently.

Rodimus Prime: What the pit is going on?!


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
Blackfang sighs and bows a bit.

Blackfang: Alright then. But as Yggie there said, we first have to 
know if the Matrix is on Earth. We'll have to wait for Mint-Breath 
here. And, the only flying okay ship on this rock remains Tripred 
base. I don't think they just lend it.

After a few seconds, the CR where Azure was resting shakes up... and 
violently, at that.
